20101209190006.000|20101209190007.000|CCO|UNSTABLE CHEMICALS.
20101209190007.000|20101209190008.000|CCO|EVEN BOMB-DISPOSING ROBOTS 
20101209190008.000|20101209190009.000|CCO|COULDN'T GET RID OF THEM.
20101209190009.000|20101209190010.000|CCO|EVERY ROOM IN THE HOUSE IS 
20101209190010.000|20101209190011.000|CCO|PACKED WITH PILES OF EXPLOSIVES 
20101209190011.000|20101209190012.667|CCO|MATERIALS RELATED TO MAKING 
20101209190012.667|20101209190014.333|CCO|HOME-MADE BOMBS.
20101209190014.333|20101209190016.000|CCO|THEY'RE HOPING THIS FIRE REACHES
20101209190016.000|20101209190017.667|CCO|A TEMPERATURE OF ABOUT 1,800 
20101209190017.667|20101209190019.333|CCO|DEGREES, WHICH WOULD, THEY HOPE,
20101209190019.333|20101209190021.000|CCO|BE HOT ENOUGH TO NEUTRALIZE THE 
20101209190021.000|20101209190022.667|CCO|EXPLOSIVES INSIDE.
20101209190022.667|20101209190024.333|CCO|THAT'S WHY THIS IS SUCH A 
20101209190024.333|20101209190026.000|CCO|REMARKABLE THING TO LOOK AT.
20101209190026.000|20101209190027.667|CCO|THIS FIRE IS BURNING.
20101209190027.667|20101209190029.333|CCO|AND THOSE ARE CHEMICALS FOR 
20101209190029.333|20101209190031.000|CCO|BOMB-MAKING THAT ARE INSIDE THE 
20101209190031.000|20101209190032.250|CCO|PLACE.
20101209190032.250|20101209190033.500|CCO|SO WE DON'T KNOW WHAT WE'RE 
20101209190033.500|20101209190034.750|CCO|GOING TO SEE.
20101209190034.750|20101209190036.000|CCO|WE DON'T KNOW IF THE ROOF IS 
20101209190036.000|20101209190037.250|CCO|GOING TO BLOW OFF THAT HOUSE.
20101209190037.250|20101209190038.500|CCO|OFFICIALS FROM 50 DIFFERENT 
20101209190038.500|20101209190039.750|CCO|AGENCIES, LAW ENFORCEMENT AND 
20101209190039.750|20101209190041.000|CCO|GOVERNMENT AGENCIES, HAVE BEEN 
20101209190041.000|20101209190042.429|CCO|INVOLVED IN THE PLANNING OF THIS
20101209190042.429|20101209190043.857|CCO|TO MAKE SURE THAT EVERYBODY 
20101209190043.857|20101209190045.286|CCO|AROUND IS PROTECTED.
20101209190045.286|20101209190046.714|CCO|YOU CAN SEE SOME VERY, VERY 
20101209190046.714|20101209190048.143|CCO|THICK, BLACK SMOKE WAFTING AWAY.
20101209190048.143|20101209190049.571|CCO|THEY APPARENTLY KNOW WHAT A LOT 
20101209190049.571|20101209190051.000|CCO|OF THE MATERIALS ARE INSIDE 
20101209190051.000|20101209190052.667|CCO|THERE, BUT THEY WANT THIS HOUSE 
20101209190052.667|20101209190054.333|CCO|BASICALLY TO BURN TO THE GROUND.
20101209190054.333|20101209190056.000|CCO|THEY WANT A VERY, VERY HOT FIRE 
20101209190056.000|20101209190057.667|CCO|TO BURN EVERYTHING IN THIS 
20101209190057.667|20101209190059.333|CCO|HOUSE, SPECIFICALLY THE 
20101209190059.333|20101209190101.000|CCO|CHEMICALS IN THERE THAT HAVE 
20101209190101.000|20101209190102.111|CCO|BEEN USED FOR MAKING BOMBS.
20101209190102.111|20101209190103.222|CCO|SO THESE ARE LIVE PICTURES 
20101209190103.222|20101209190104.333|CCO|YOU'RE SEEING.
20101209190104.333|20101209190105.444|CCO|THEY HAVE SET THIS HOUSE ON 
20101209190105.444|20101209190106.556|CCO|FIRE.
20101209190106.556|20101209190107.667|CCO|THESE ARE THE EARLY STAGES OF 
20101209190107.667|20101209190108.778|CCO|THIS FIRE.
20101209190108.778|20101209190109.889|CCO|WE DON'T KNOW HOW LONG THIS 
20101209190109.889|20101209190111.000|CCO|COULD TAKE.
20101209190111.000|20101209190112.250|CCO|IT COULD TAKE HOURS TO GET 
20101209190112.250|20101209190113.500|CCO|THROUGH EVERYTHING.

20101209190117.250|20101209190118.500|CCO|HAPPENING WITH THIS FIRE.

20101209190122.667|20101209190124.333|CCO|IS BLOWING TOWARD.

20101209190126.000|20101209190127.667|CCO|SMOKE COMING IN THIS DIRECTION.

20101209190129.333|20101209190131.000|CCO|GOT, YOU SEE A VERY, VERY 
20101209190131.000|20101209190132.429|CCO|ACTIVE, FULLY-INVOLVED HOUSE 
20101209190132.429|20101209190133.857|CCO|FIRE.

20101209190139.571|20101209190141.000|CCO|AS YOU CAN SEE, IT LOOKS LIKE A 
20101209190141.000|20101209190142.429|CCO|DENSELY POPULATED AREA.

20101209190143.857|20101209190145.286|CCO|FIRE-RETARDANT MATERIALS TO THE

20101209190210.000|20101209190211.667|CCO|WITH TOO MANY CHEMICALS IN IT TO

20101209190533.333|20101209190535.000|CCO|IN ORDER TO NEUTRALIZE THE

20101209190538.333|20101209190540.000|CCO|HOUSE.
20101209190540.000|20101209190542.000|CCO|NORMALLY YOU WOULD SEND IN -- IF
20101209190542.000|20101209190544.000|CCO|IT'S TOO DANGEROUS FOR PEOPLE TO
20101209190544.000|20101209190546.000|CCO|GO IN, YOU SEND IN A ROBOT.

20101209190600.000|20101209190601.667|CCO|THE BOMB-MAKING STUFF WITHOUT

20101209190603.333|20101209190605.000|CCO|ACTUALLY CREATING AN EXPLOSION.
20101209190605.000|20101209190606.667|CCO|THEY DIDN'T WANT TO SEND HUMANS 
20101209190606.667|20101209190608.333|CCO|THERE.
20101209190608.333|20101209190610.000|CCO|THEY WENT UP ON THE ROOF, FOR 
20101209190610.000|20101209190611.429|CCO|INSTANCE, CUT HOLES IN IT, SAWED
20101209190611.429|20101209190612.857|CCO|HOLES IN THE ROOF SO THAT -- AS 
20101209190612.857|20101209190614.286|CCO|YOU CAN SEE, A NORMAL HOUSE FIRE
20101209190614.286|20101209190615.714|CCO|BURNS PRETTY WELL.
20101209190615.714|20101209190617.143|CCO|THEY WANTED AS MUCH VENTILATION 
20101209190617.143|20101209190618.571|CCO|TO GET THROUGH THAT HOUSE AS 
20101209190618.571|20101209190620.000|CCO|POSSIBLE SO WHEN THEY SET FIRE 
20101209190620.000|20101209190622.000|CCO|TO IT, A DELIBERATE FIRE, IT 
20101209190622.000|20101209190624.000|CCO|WOULD BURN A LOT OF THE 
20101209190624.000|20101209190626.000|CCO|MATERIALS IN THE HOUSE.
20101209190626.000|20101209190628.000|CCO|IT WOULD BURN HOT SO THAT IT 
20101209190628.000|20101209190630.000|CCO|WILL NEUTRALIZE THE CHEMICALS IN
20101209190630.000|20101209190632.000|CCO|THE HOUSE.
